subcommands.name: build
subcommands.description: build image(s) from template

flags.description: Disable color output. (Default: color)
Debug mode enabled for builds.
Run all builds and post-processors other than these.
Force a build to continue if artifacts exist, deletes existing artifacts.
Disable the loading of prerelease plugin binaries (x.y.z-dev).
Produce machine-readable output.
Build only the specified builds.
Number of builds to run in parallel. 1 disables parallelization. 0 means no limit (Default: 0)
Enable prefixing of each ui output with an RFC3339 timestamp.
Fallback to using a sequential approach for local/datasource evaluation.
Variable for templates, can be used multiple times.
JSON or HCL2 file containing user variables, can be used multiple times.
Display warnings for user variable files containing undeclared variables.

subcommands.name: console
subcommands.description: creates a console for testing variable interpolation

flags.description: Set to 'hcl2' to run in HCL2 mode when no file is passed. Defaults to json.
Fallback to using a sequential approach for local/datasource evaluation.
Variable for templates, can be used multiple times.
JSON or HCL2 file containing user variables.

subcommands.name: fix
subcommands.description: fixes templates from old versions of packer

flags.description: If true (default), validates the fixed template.

subcommands.name: amazon-private-ip
subcommands.description: Replaces `"ssh_private_ip": true` in amazon builders with `"ssh_interface": "private_ip"`

subcommands.name: amazon-shutdown_behavior
subcommands.description: Changes "shutdown_behaviour" to "shutdown_behavior" in Amazon builders. amazon-enhanced-networking Replaces "enhanced_networking" in builders with "ena_support"

subcommands.name: amazon-temp-sec-cidrs
subcommands.description: Replaces "temporary_security_group_source_cidr" (string) with "temporary_security_group_source_cidrs" (list of strings)

subcommands.name: azure-exclude_from_latest
subcommands.description: Changes "exlude_from_latest" to "exclude_from_latest" in Azure builders.

subcommands.name: clean-image-name
subcommands.description: Replaces /clean_(image|ami)_name/ in builder configs with "clean_resource_name"

subcommands.name: comm-config
subcommands.description: Remove ssh prefixes from communicator port forwarding configuration (host_port_min, host_port_max, skip_nat_mapping)

subcommands.name: createtime
subcommands.description: Replaces ".CreateTime" in builder configs with "{{timestamp}}"

subcommands.name: docker-email
subcommands.description: Removes "login_email" from the Docker builder.

subcommands.name: docker-tag-tags
subcommands.description: Updates "docker" post-processor so any "tag" field is renamed to "tags".

subcommands.name: galaxy-command
subcommands.description: Replaces "galaxycommand" in ansible-local provisioner configs with "galaxy_command"

subcommands.name: hyperv-cpu-and-ram
subcommands.description: Replaces "cpu" with "cpus" and "ram_size" with "memory"in Hyper-V VMCX builder templates

subcommands.name: hyperv-deprecations
subcommands.description: Removes the deprecated "vhd_temp_path" setting from Hyper-V ISO builder templates

subcommands.name: hyperv-vmxc-typo
subcommands.description: Fixes a typo replacing "clone_from_vmxc_path" with "clone_from_vmcx_path" in Hyper-V VMCX builder templates

subcommands.name: iso-checksum-type-and-url
subcommands.description: Puts content of potential "iso_checksum_url" and "iso_checksum_url" in "iso_checksum"

subcommands.name: iso-md5
subcommands.description: Replaces "iso_md5" in builders with "iso_checksum"

subcommands.name: manifest-filename
subcommands.description: Updates "manifest" post-processor so any "filename" field is renamed to "output".

subcommands.name: parallels-deprecations
subcommands.description: Removes deprecated "parallels_tools_host_path" from Parallels builders and changes "guest_os_distribution" to "guest_os_type".

subcommands.name: parallels-headless
subcommands.description: Removes unused "headless" from Parallels builders

subcommands.name: powershell-escapes
subcommands.description: Removes PowerShell escapes from user env vars and elevated username and password strings

subcommands.name: pp-vagrant-override
subcommands.description: Fixes provider-specific overrides for Vagrant post-processor

subcommands.name: proxmox-type
subcommands.description: Updates the builder type proxmox to proxmox-iso

subcommands.name: qemu-disk-size
subcommands.description: Updates "disk_size" from int to string in QEMU builders.

subcommands.name: qemu-host-port
subcommands.description: Updates ssh_host_port_min and ssh_host_port_max to host_port_min and host_port_max

subcommands.name: scaleway-access-key
subcommands.description: Updates builders using "access_key" to use "organization_id"

subcommands.name: spot-price-auto-product
subcommands.description: Removes the deprecated "spot_price_auto_product" setting from Amazon builder templates

subcommands.name: ssh-wait-timeout
subcommands.description: Replaces "ssh_wait_timeout" with "ssh_timeout"

subcommands.name: sshdisableagent
subcommands.description: Updates builders using "ssh_disable_agent" to use "ssh_disable_agent_forwarding"

subcommands.name: sshkeypath
subcommands.description: Updates builders using "ssh_key_path" to use "ssh_private_key_file"

subcommands.name: virtualbox-gaattach
subcommands.description: Updates VirtualBox builders using "guest_additions_attach" to use "guest_additions_mode"

subcommands.name: virtualbox-rename
subcommands.description: Updates "virtualbox" builders to "virtualbox-iso"

subcommands.name: vmware-compaction
subcommands.description: Adds "skip_compaction = true" to "vmware-iso" builders with incompatible disk_type_id

subcommands.name: vmware-rename
subcommands.description: Updates "vmware" builders to "vmware-iso"

subcommands.name: vsphere-iso-net-disk
subcommands.description: Removes deprecated network and disk fields from "vsphere-iso" builder

subcommands.name: fmt
subcommands.description: Rewrites HCL2 config files to canonical format

flags.description: Check if the input is formatted. Exit status will be 0 if all input is properly formatted and non-zero otherwise.
Display diffs of formatting change
Also process files in subdirectories. By default, only the given directory (or current directory) is processed.
Don't write to source files (always disabled if using -check)

subcommands.name: hcl2_upgrade
subcommands.description: transform a JSON template into an HCL2 configuration

flags.description: Set output file name. By default this will be the TEMPLATE name with ".pkr.hcl" appended to it. To be a valid Packer HCL template, it must have the suffix ".pkr.hcl"
Add helper annotation comments to the file to help new HCL2 users understand the template format.

subcommands.name: init
subcommands.description: Install missing plugins or upgrade plugins

flags.description: Forces reinstallation of plugins, even if already installed.

On top of installing missing plugins, update installed plugins to the latest available version, if there is a new higher one. Note that this still takes into consideration the version constraint of the config.

subcommands.name: inspect
subcommands.description: see components of a template

flags.description: Machine-readable output
Fallback to using a sequential approach for local/datasource evaluation.

subcommands.name: plugins
subcommands.description: Interact with Packer plugins and catalog

subcommands.name: install
subcommands.description: Install latest Packer plugin [matching version constraint]

flags.description: Forces reinstallation of plugins, even if already installed.

Install the plugin from a locally-sourced plugin binary. This installs the plugin where a normal invocation would, but will not try to download it from a remote location, and instead install the binary in the Packer plugins path. This option cannot be specified with a version constraint.

subcommands.name: installed
subcommands.description: List all installed Packer plugin binaries

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Remove Packer plugins [matching a version]

subcommands.name: required
subcommands.description: List plugins required by a config

subcommands.name: validate
subcommands.description: check that a template is valid

flags.description: Evaluate data sources during validation (HCL2 only, may incur costs); Defaults to false.
Validate all builds other than these.
Disable the loading of prerelease plugin binaries (x.y.z-dev).
Produce machine-readable output.
Disable warnings for user variable files containing undeclared variables.
Validate only these builds.
Only check syntax. Do not verify config of the template.
Fallback to using a sequential approach for local/datasource evaluation.
Variable for templates, can be used multiple times.
JSON or HCL2 file containing user variables, can be used multiple times.

subcommands.name: version
subcommands.description: Prints the Packer version
